creator: chaithanya.taduri@tcs.com
text:
Hi All,


We are getting multiple hits from single IP with same URI. Sometimes the hits are 15000 in 15 minutes and server process are increasing upto 258(set value for number of child processes). We are not sure of the root cause. So logging ticket to get your support.Please help us

This bigzilla is for reporting bugs only, not for support.

Please use the users@httpd.apache.org mailing list.
creator: ylavic.dev@gmail.com
